WRITING.TITLE: German Smite-Community is searching for more "members"
WRITING.TEXT: Hey there, the following text is written in german! We are a non-profit-community. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hallo Smiter, wir, uSmite (uSMT, [Website](http://www.usmite.de)) sind eine Multigaming-Community und spielen momentan unter anderem sehr viel Smite. Bei uns gibt's keine festen Mitglieder o. #228;. Wir treffen uns jeden Tag auf unserem TS3-Server und bilden je nach Bedarf Smite-Gr #252;ppchen, welche nat #252;rlich mehrfach durchgewechselt werden: So gesehen eine Smite-Lobby f #252;r deutsche Spieler. Spa #223; steht im Vordergrund! Momentan steht die #220;berlegung im Raum, ein Portal f #252;r die deutschen Smite-Spieler zu starten - Es wird also auch in Zukunft noch viel Smite gespielt Wer also einfach mal Lust auf eine gepflegte Runde Smite hat, kann gerne auf unserem TS vorbeisehen: ts.usmite.de (EDIT: Wir sind inzwischen eine Smite-Community!) F #252;r gew #246;hnlich halten wir (wenn anwesend ca. 8-10 Smitespieler) uns im unteren Bereich des Servers in den privaten Channels auf. F #252;r das erste Betreten m #252;sste man euch ziehen, einfach ComboCraft, Pat (Smite: Extroke), Rosetti (Smite: Nordphilz) Jesus (Smite: JesusPwnsYa) oder Biohazard (Smite: subject4406) anstupsen Ansonsten einfach mal im Forum registrieren - Dort sind wir auch ohne separaten Smite-Bereich aktiv Beste Gr #252; #223;e und bis bald, subject4406 PS: Beste Antreffm #246;glichkeiten in der Woche nachmittags/abends und am Wochenende den ganzen Tag. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WRITING.TITLE: [Reddit Gold Giveaway] Show Me Your Best Smite-Screenshot!
WRITING.TEXT: Hello Smiters :) I want to give away some Reddit-Gold (1 to 5 credits) - Just show me your "best" Smite-Screenshot, which can be photoshoped of you want. In a few hours (I think about 8-10 hours) I will choose some of the best and gild the answers. The amount of gold will vary with the amount of screenshots you post here. I hope you'll enjoy, have fun :) Information: http://www.reddit.com/gold/about /u/SirValkers and /u/Hell_Shoot got Gold! :)=

WRITING.TITLE: Half-Life 3 is out!
Thanatos on the streets of Guadalajara, Mexico
Need Help - Problems with support :(
WRITING.TEXT: *English is not my native language - I'm sorry for mistakes* Hey there, I hope you can help me. It would be my last chance before christmas. What happened: I wanted to make a friend and his girlfriend a small christmas present and we all play a lot of Smite. So I bought 800 gems for him and 800 for her. While I bought the second time, the Hi-Rez-Page had an error and both pruchases were granted to my friend but not to his girlfriend. I opened a support-ticket ( 12/18/2014 04:59 AM ) and got a fast answer ( 12/18/2014 06:35 AM ) that it'll be forwarded to the right place. Since then I got no further answer... I ansered a few times and wanted to know what will happen now and when but they are stil not responding :( I just wanted to make a small present but no one can help with this problem... I would accept this time when it would be my fault but it isn't :-( I'll just hope that anyone who can do anything in this case will read this... I wish you all nice holidays and merry christmas.

WRITING.TITLE: Reminder: The SWC 2015 will brake all LoL-Price-Pools! It'll be on place 2/3 of the world largest Price-Pools! (I think it'll be place 3)
[INFO] Another MOBA (Smite) just overtook the largest LoL-eSport-Price-Pool and it's stil growing
WRITING.TEXT: It's crowd-sourced (about 20% of an in-game-pruchase of a special event will be added to the price-pool. It's now at $ 2,140,319 and can grow up until january. LoL had the third biggest price-pool in eSport-history with $ 2,130,000

WRITING.TITLE: "Customer-Support at its best!" In other words: How to make your customers angry or playing another game! Spent exactly 555,71 #8364; on Smite to get this awesome support.
My first Penta-Kill! I did not capture it but I'm happy at all. Just wanted to share it =)
What if new conquest map changes with the progress
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, saw this post: http://redd.it/2t1dp1 and got an idea... The conquest map could change with the progress... It starts with 50/50 chaos and order... every time a tower or a phonex gets destroyed the map could become a bit more dark/light. If both teams destroys a tower it'd be 50/50 again. This could also change with the amount of kills or whatever... I think it would be much work to implement this but maybe it's possible (for season 3?) BTW: The idea that the volcano explodes at minute 10 is great! Sorry for my bad English :)

WRITING.TITLE: Just want to share my anger about HeroesFire.com
WRITING.TEXT: They have a giveaway for three days and giving 200 keys (100 EU and 100 NA) every day. I checked the site for 12 hours today in a 1-3 minutes intervall. NOW, after 12 hours of hoping for a key I got the message that I can claim one. I should choose between EU and NA. I choosed EU and a window appeared where I could confirm my choice. I took about 5 seconds to get sure that I made the right choice (EU) so I confirmed it. I came back the the site, where I've had to read "No More Keys" the last 12 hours... Is this site just wanting to generate clicks? So damn frustrating -.-' *Edit: /u/HaughtyPandaLove was so generous and gave me a key he had! Thank you so much, I didn't expect that. I'll try to get keys with other giveaways and if I get one, I'll share it with this subreddit!*

[Suggestion] Please Add Some More Rank-Images In-Game.
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, it bothers me a little bit that there are different rank-images for every 5 ranks in the battlelog but in-game there is only one image for 25(!) ranks. When I look at the scoreboard a want to have a fast overview of what ranks my mates/enemies are. It would be okay if there would be 1 image for 5 ranks because (for me) it is irrelevant if someone is rank 35 or 39. But now someone can be rank 25 or 49 with the same image. What are your thoughts?

WRITING.TITLE: Dodging A Rocket Like A Boss (1080p in comments)
Don't buy Soldier-Camo -It's a waste.
WRITING.TEXT: Just bought one for the operator ($ 250.000)... After that you'll recognize, that you need to buy it for the other team, too... Okay but THEN: There are 3-4 different camos for the different maps. So you need about $ 1.500.000 - $ 2.000.000 to buy camos for ONE class... That's cruel. It is okay for me to spend $ 250.000 for one camo per class per team... But why do you have to buy a new one for every map? Opinions?

HiRezStew: "We are working to mitigate a DDOS attack. More information shortly."
HiRezStew: "Update: Engineers are still working to mitigate the network attack. Currently expect to be back up within the hour."
HiRezStew: "UPDATE: We are troubleshooting an issue with our traffic re-routing. Will update as resolved."
HiRezStew: "Update: Still working on it everyone. I am as frustrated as anyone! Will provide updates as progress."
Suggestion: Premium-Feature To Record The Last 10 Games Automatically. (E. G. For Youtubers)
WRITING.TEXT: First: I know that most of us don't like to invenst money for little features like this. But keep in mind that storage space costs money and Hi-Rez needs to make some money to keep the game running. I miss the feature that we can watch records of our games. I only had one penta and at this time, shadowplay wasn't running so I'll never have the chance to see my personal highlight in Smite again. I would like to see the possibility of buying a feature, like automatically record the 10 last played games. This would give Hi-Rez some money and only those wo need it, can buy it. Youtubers could use it to make better compilations of Smite with different angles and so on. What do you think? :) PS: The feature is not available in the most games and nearly nobody is complaining about this. Please be constructive with your criticism.

Shadowplay bad teamspeak-quality and voice-activation
WRITING.TEXT: Hey there, I love using shadowplay but I have some issues. First of all, the sound is great except the sound coming from teamspeak. My mates sound like trash (I hear their voice with good quality)... Any ideas? Second issue is, that I use a studio-mic and this one records nearly every(!) sound in my homeoffice (even behind the mic) - In Teamspeak I use voice-activation to solve the problem but shadowplay only allows me to use push to talk (which I dont like) and record all the sound what is destroying my videos because you can hear everything (typing, breathing, the tv 2 rooms away and so on)... Any ideas? Thank you in advance :)

WRITING.TITLE: Nvidia Shadowplay-Issues. Can Someone Help Me? :x
WRITING.TEXT: Hey there I love using shadowplay but I have some issues. First of all, the sound is great except the sound coming from teamspeak.
